title: UEFA ( Union of European Football Associations ) total revenue 2004 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million euros, with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately positive which exists from 2008/09 to 2004/05.
Likewise, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2015/16 to 2012/13.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2017/18 to 2015/16.
Differently, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2012/13 to 2010/11.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2010/11 to 2008/09.
gold: This statistic shows the total revenue of the UEFA from the 2004/05 season to the 2017/18 season . The season runs from July 1 to June 30 of the following year . The revenue of the 2017/18 season was 2.79 billion euros .
